title: Understanding Active Listening
text: Active listening is a crucial skill in therapeutic communication. It involves more than just hearing the words spoken by the patient.

title: Components of Active Listening
text: Consider the elements that make up active listening. It includes paying attention, showing that you're listening, providing feedback, and responding appropriately.
